title: Science Competency Enhancement Course Using an AI-Integrated Adaptive Collaborative E-Learning System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners interact flexibly with content via mobile devices and receive personalized learning experiences through real-time collaboration with peers and AI-based feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply personalized science content with over 90% accuracy using an AI-based adaptive learning system
Learners can complete science problem-solving projects with over 80% participation rates through digital collaboration tools with peers
Learners can submit project deliverables applying science concepts with over 75% completion rates by reflecting on system-provided feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
